titles.title: CLEAR Act
CLEAR Act
Connecting Lobbyists and Electeds for Accountability and Reform Act

A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require certain reports filed under such Act to include the disclosure of persons who are registered lobbyists under the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Connecting Lobbyists and Electeds for Accountability and Reform Act or the CLEAR Act
This bill requires reports filed by political committees, reports filed by persons making independent expenditures, and reports filed by persons making disbursements for electioneering communications to disclose if individuals identified in the reports are registered lobbyists.
